title: Pregnant Jesinta Franklin shows off burgeoning baby bump in blue dress at Olay beauty event in Bondi
text:
She announced she was pregnant with her first child back in August.

And on Friday, Jesinta Franklin (née Campbell) proudly showed off her burgeoning baby bump while attending an Olay beauty event at Hotel Ravesis in Bondi.

Taking to Instagram, the 28-year-old shared several snaps of herself at the event, which shows her wearing a blue wrap dress from The Sustainable Wardrobe.

Proud mama! Jesinta Franklin (pictured) proudly showed off her burgeoning baby bump while attending an Olay beauty event at Hotel Ravesis in Bondi

Jesinta flaunts her pregnancy glow in the photos and looks effortlessly chic in the loose-fitting frock, which cradles her curves and highlights her growing belly.

'Beautiful afternoon at @hotelravesis with @olayau,' Jesinta captioned the snaps.

In one of the photos, she casts a model-like gaze towards the lens while standing next to a semi-circular window that overlooks Bondi Beach.

Baby blue! Jesinta (pictured) shared a snap of herself at the event, which shows her wearing a blue wrap dress from The Sustainable Wardrobe

She's got the look! In a follow-up snap, Jesinta (pictured) poses with her eyes closed, while leaning her arm on the wall and resting one leg gently on the other

She shows off her incredibly youthful visage with a barely-there makeup look, and her sleek ice blonde tresses are worn up off her face.

Jesinta elevates her glamorous - albeit understated - look with a pair of comfortable white slip-on heeled sandals.

In several follow-up snaps, Jesinta poses with her eyes closed, while leaning her arm on the wall and resting one leg gently on the other.

So glam! Another photo, which was shared to her Instagram Stories, shows Jesinta (pictured) lounging on a red sofa, while casting a pensive gaze

Strike a pose! Jesinta (pictured) shared several photos of herself at the event to her Instagram Stories

Another photo, which was shared to her Instagram Stories, shows the blonde beauty lounging on a red sofa, while casting a pensive gaze.

She also shared several selfies to her Stories, including one cute snap of herself and her 'A Team' - including makeup artist Michael Brown and Chelsea Down.

Speaking to Daily Mail Australia at Myer's 2019 Spring Style Edit Event in Melbourne on August 30, Jesinta confessed her pregnancy had been a difficult journey so far.

'I've spent more time in bed and on the couch than I've actually [been] outdoors in the sunshine,' she said. 'But I'm feeling much better now.'
description: Jesinta Franklin (née Campbell) proudly showed off her burgeoning baby bump while attending an Olay beauty event at Hotel Ravesis in Bondi.
authors: Mark Brook For Daily Mail Australia
